messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Enemy communication intercepted. Security level elevated.

A summary has been copied and printed to all communications consoles.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: If you see the lawyer pucn him nearly to death, but only nearly

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: EVERYONE COME TO BRIG, THIS IS URGENT

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: Be a good boy/girl/trans and don't fuck up the station more please.
